meanings.definition: A type of jet engine designed for hypersonic speeds.
meanings.sent1: The scramjets power the futuristic aircraft.
meanings.sent2: The engineers are studying scramjets for their speed capabilities.
meanings.sent3: The scramjets decided to have a race with the propellers.
meanings.sent4: In the race of engines, the scramjets left all others behind.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the scramjets echoed through the air, leaving a trail of speed behind.

meanings.definition: The scramjets are being tested for use in military aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Military experts are evaluating the performance of scramjets.
meanings.sent2: The development of scramjets for military purposes is progressing.
meanings.sent3: The scramjets enlisted in the Air Force after passing their tests.
meanings.sent4: The power of the scramjets in combat simulations was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The pilots felt invincible with the scramjets at their command.
